snippet: The move seeks new ways to increase sales and make itself more relevant to shoppers, particularly those in their 20s and 30s.
abstract: Best Buy begins offering customers wedding registries, part of its effort to increase sales.
lead_paragraph: The move seeks new ways to increase sales and make itself more relevant to shoppers, particularly those in their 20s and 30s.

headline.main: Best Buy Opens Wedding Registry in Bid for New Sales
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Opens Wedding Registry in Bid for New Sales
